BlackStorm:

"I'm comming"said the femme and she looked to Hev and Battera, she 
said "Cya"

she lef the Mess hall and walked towards the exit



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/5/03 12:34:12 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Perceptor said "Well, my dear Maxima... If something happens 
send me an 
> > encoded message and I'll activate the the virus that is inside 
her... do it 
> > just in case that Maximals took her prisioner and anything else 
can be do 
> > to avoid it..."
> 
> She nodded. "Understood." 
> 
> She gazed a moment at Hydras. It would be a little while before 
she saw him 
> again. & hopefully, he would awake soon. 
> 
> She then turned & left the CR Chamber. Opening her com, >"Maxima 
to 
> Blackstorm! Meet me in the main hangery bay. We are going on a 
long Recon!"< 
> 
> Maxima then made her way to the Hanger & waited for Blackstorm 
there.
